Name: Graph.Line
Desc: Line graph plotting and visualization for VulpiniQ.
LongDesc: The Graph.Line module enables the creation and rendering of line graphs, supporting features such as grid, axes, tooltips, and customizable styles. It is designed for visualizing data series with advanced options for interactivity and appearance.
Example:
// Using Q helper to create and show a Line graph
Q.Graph.Line().data([5, 10, 7, 12]).appendTo(document.body);
